properties.name: jwt.secret
properties.description: The secret used to sign the JWT.

properties.name: application.allowed.origins
properties.description: The list of allowed client origins.

properties.name: application.email.confirmation.required
properties.description: Whether the user email confirmation is required.

properties.name: application.email.confirmation.token-lifetime
properties.description: The lifetime of the email confirmation token (ms).

properties.name: jwt.expiration.access
properties.description: The expiration time of the access token (ms).

properties.name: jwt.expiration.refresh
properties.description: The expiration time of the refresh token (ms).

properties.name: application.swagger.enable-ssl
properties.description: Whether to enable SSL for Swagger server.

properties.name: application.swagger.hosts
properties.description: The list of allowed Swagger hosts.
